title: Ahri gameplay question
body: Why does Ahri's first e on the blue or red heal them back up????

replies.body:
Spaghetti code. 

It seems like the charm causes them to reset for some reason? Either way, bug fixes come out a patch or two after discovery.

Very rarely is a champion bug fixed same patch, and that’s for game breaking ones.
Thank you. Should i report or do you think it's already done?

> [{quoted}](name=RERATED,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dnT6erpP,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-03-05T22:46:36.834+0000)
>
> Thank you. Should i report or do you think it's already done?

It’s already come up on the boards. If you insist on bringing it up again, you can make a thread on the Report a Bug section. While not necessary, many appreciate there being video evidence.

> [{quoted}](name=RERATED,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dnT6erpP,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-03-05T22:39:23.985+0000)
>
> Why does Ahri&#039;s first e on the blue or red heal them back up????

it happens with all jungle camps,i already reported it 3 or 4 times since new runes got released on PBE (like 2/3 months before they came on live),yet they didn't fix it

Same with Shaco box. 

Riot don't care.
Charm has been healing shit for a while, and nobody is entirely sure why. It had a bizarre interaction with stoneplate a while ago.
